text_logic_form: The line $BD$ is tangent to the circle $A$ at point $X$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $DX$ is $12x + 2$ units.
The length of the line $XC$ is $10x$ units.
The length of the line $EX$ is $x + 1$ units.
The length of the line $BX$ is $x$ units.
Point $X$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $D$.
Point $X$ also lies on the line connecting $E$ and $C$.
circle_instances: There is a circle $A$ with center at point $A$.
